alert.note: Alert for Autauga; Elmore; Montgomery (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 3:53PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Autauga, southwestern Elmore and northwestern Montgomery Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 353 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over northwestern Montgomery, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Western Montgomery, Prattville, Millbrook, Coosada, Autaugaville, Booth, Hunter, Montgomery Zoo, Boylston, Alabama State University, Autauga County Airport, Woodcrest, Dannelly Field, Maxwell Air Force Base, Montgomery Riverwalk Stadium, Gunter Air Force Base and Alabama State Capitol. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
